translation.legal-mor: Xsolla is the official distributor of this content.
translation.legal-mor-eu: When you buy this content from Xsolla, you're stating that you're an adult and have carefully read and agreed to the EULA.
translation.legal-terms: By proceeding, you confirm you’re an adult according to your country laws and agree to be bound by Xsolla’s EULA.
translation.legal-terms-us: By proceeding, you confirm you’re an adult according to your country laws and agree to be bound by Xsolla’s EULA. This purchase grants a license for the software or digital content. See full terms here: EULA.
translation.legal-terms-eu: By proceeding with the payment, you hereby request immediate performance of the agreement and acknowledge that you thereby lose your right of withdrawal.
translation.legal-cookies: Xsolla collects essential cookies only. Xsolla Cookie Policy.
translation.legal-support: If you have any questions, please reach out to Xsolla Gamer Support.
translation.status.processing.title: Processing payment
translation.status.error.title: Payment failed
translation.status.success.title: Payment successful
translation.status.message.auto-cancellation: Complete the transaction with the selected payment method. If you choose not to complete it on the payment method's page, close this window. Your account won't be charged.
translation.finance-details-vat-ghana: VAT, NHIL, GETFund Levy, and Covid-19 Levy
translation.finance-details-vat-ghana-including: Including VAT, NHIL, GETFund Levy, and Covid-19 Levy
translation.saving-status.processing.title: Saving payment information
translation.saving-status.processing.description: Waiting for payment method to save...
translation.saving-status.error.title: Couldn't save payment method
translation.saving-status.success.title: Payment method saved
translation.apple-pay.errors.payment: Unable to process your payment. Make sure you’re signed in to Apple on your device and set up Apple Pay before you try again. Changes in Apple settings take a couple of minutes to sync.
translation.apple-pay.errors.device-is-not-capable: Apple Pay is available only in Safari browser with installed OS 10.12 Sierra or IOS 10. Please change your browser or select another payment option.
translation.xsolla-number.payment.description: To process your payment, we need to verify your account
translation.xsolla-number.payment.title: Payment via {{paymentMethodName}}
translation.xsolla-number.instruction.paragraph-two: 2. Press the {{projectName}} or Xsolla button on the payment kiosk.
translation.xsolla-number.instruction.paragraph-thre: 3. Enter your user account name or Xsolla number.
translation.xsolla-number.instruction.paragraph-four: 4. Insert cash to complete the transaction.
translation.xsolla-number.instruction.notification: Terminal owner may charge additional commission
translation.xsolla-number.notification.success.email: We sent payment instruction to your email. If you haven’t received them, try again.
translation.xsolla-number.notification.success.sms: We sent your Xsolla number to your phone number. If you haven't received it, try again.
translation.xsolla-number.notification.failed: Can’t send payment instructions. Try again later.
translation.cash-payment-instruction.description: We've issued a bill for your purchase. Once you’ve paid, we'll email you the receipt.
translation.cash-payment-instruction.title: Payment via {{paymentMethodName}}
translation.validation-error.expiration-min-month: Enter a month that includes or comes after {{minMonth}}
translation.validation-error.expiration-max-month: Enter a month that includes or comes before {{maxMonth}}
translation.validation-error.expiration-min-year: Enter a year that includes or comes after {{minYear}}
translation.validation-error.expiration-max-year: Enter a year that includes or comes before {{maxYear}}
